description: Room annotation processor fails to generate DAO implementation code. Common with SQL syntax errors or type mismatches.
commonCauses: Return type doesn't match query result
Column name mismatch between query and entity
Kotlin suspend function without proper Flow/LiveData
solutions: Validate SQL syntax in query annotation
Ensure return type matches query projection
Use correct parameter types matching column types
Verify column names match entity fields
Use supported return types: Flow, LiveData, List, suspend
Check Room compiler error messages carefully
prevention: Test queries with sample data in unit tests
Enable kapt error logging for detailed messages
Use data classes for query results
Validate SQL in database client before adding to DAO
Keep Room library version up to date
examples: @Dao interface ScanDao { @Query("SELECT * FROM scans") fun getAll(): Flow<List<Scan>> }
@Query("SELECT userId, COUNT(*) as count FROM scans GROUP BY userId") fun getCounts(): List<UserCount>
data class UserCount(val userId: Int, val count: Int)
